Project Documentation

Overview of the project.

Getting Started

How to get started.

Prerequisites

You need Go 1.24+.

Installation

Run go install.

Usage

Basic Usage

Run the binary:

bash 
cooked --port 8080

Advanced Usage

Configure with environment variables.

API Reference

Endpoints

GET /healthz

Health check endpoint.

GET /{upstream_url}

Render a document.
